About

I build beautiful web applications using HTML, Sass, and JavaScript. I have a BA in Emerging Media and Communication from UT-Dallas.

I prefer my user interfaces to be functional, quick, efficient, and elegantly + thoughtfully designed.

While originally from Dallas, I currently reside in Austin. It sucks that they don't have an NBA team. Texas doesn't really need another team, though.

I work remotely building web apps @ Kalkomey.
